description: Try our easy to follow Avocado & Banana Smoothie Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie bowl,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Banana,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Avocado
name: Avocado & Banana Smoothie Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 pieces Creative Gourmet Frozen Pure Passionfruit Pulp

recipeInstructions.text: Place half of the banana and half of the avocado on a large paper towel-lined baking tray. Place 2 passionfruit pieces in a small bowl and set aside for 10 min to thaw.
Meanwhile, place coconut water, 2 cups of spinach, half of the mint and remaining passionfruit, banana and avocado in a blender and blitz until smooth and creamy.
Divide smoothie among bowls. Top with banana and avocado, and remaining spinach and mint. Scatter over coconut and petitas. Spoon over passionfruit and serve.
